page.title: 15RECREATION FACILITIES
page.content: {Weeke Community Centre}is the venue for many local clubs and group activities.It is used by people of all ages. The 1761 members, aged 10_70, of {The Lawn Tennis & Squash Club}enjoy modern facilities and large social events.{Y.M.C.A Youth Community Centre The building,car park and field occupy a site of approx. 2 acres.During first week of July 1985 237 adults used the centre for activities including soccer badminton, peoples agency group, National Childbirth Trust, National Houswive's Register and Mother and Toddler group.Breakdown:114 14-18 year olds Youth Club activies,50 10-15 year olds B.M.X.Club, 11 7-9 year olds football, 90 3-4 year old playgroup, 22 3-4 year olds with mother toddlers group and creche.The field is used mainly for football,a cut to the shops and walking dogs.{Golfclub}well used.
